description:
What is the course about?

  1. A step by step video tutorial to create Spring 4 RESTful Web Service.
  2. Demonstrates the simplicity involved in using Spring framework for Web Service development.
  3. Uses Spring Boot for absolute minimum configuration.
  4. Provides introduction to Gradle build and dependency management tool.
  5. Requires just 15 mins (excluding download and setup time) to develop your first Spring 4 RESTful web service

Course Materials

  • The course is delivered as video tutorial and source code is made available.
  • The course provides step by step instructions so that even a beginner can understand and complete the task.

Course Duration

  • Around 30 mins of video material but half of that is related setup for beginners.
  • An average experienced person can get complete the task in just 15 mins.

How is the course structured

  1. We start with download and setup of gradle and move on to work space setup
  2. Add the build script required for the gradle and get an overview of the script
  3. Add the necessary JAVA code (just 2 files)
  4. Test the web service in the embedded tomcat server.
  5. Conclude the course with an executable JAR so that you can share that with your friends to showcase your work.
title: Create Spring 4 RESTful Web Service - Step By Step
